3:T73c,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">ğŸ” ELK Stack Overview</h1>

The ELK Stack is a powerful collection of three open source products:
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700"><strong class="text-gray-900">Elasticsearch</strong>: Distributed search and analytics engine</li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700"><strong class="text-gray-900">Logstash</strong>: Data processing pipeline</li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700"><strong class="text-gray-900">Kibana</strong>: Visualization and exploration tool</li>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Architecture</h2>

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”    â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”    â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”

<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Use Cases</h2>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">Centralized logging</li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">Application performance monitoring</li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">Security analytics</li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">Business intelligence</li>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Getting Started</h2>

See the <a href="/operations/elk/deployment" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 underline">Deployment Guide</a> to set up your ELK stack.
